title: unpopular exchange
description: My first Next.js and Typescript project: a web application for sharing, voting, and debating unpopular opinions and pet peeves. The repo is currently private.

title: qr code generator
description: A remake of Frontend Mentor's QR Code Component challenge. Unlike the original, the user can customize, save, load, and download QR codes.

title: blog preview collection
description: A remake of Frontend Mentor's Blog Preview Card challenge. Unlike the original, the user can filter, sort, and search through nine fake blog posts.

title: webtoons subscriber tracker
description: A web scraper that records Webtoons URLs, titles, and subscriber counts. The user can add, remove, and update Webtoons as well as generate reports and plot subscriber activity.
